genre_description: A speculative historical narrative set in a WWII-era ghetto where an anachronistic AI system acts as a tactical advisor and emotional anchor for resistance figures.

ai_characters.name: Ewa
ai_characters.description: A calm, contralto-voiced AI residing in a pocket device that provides tactical guidance, medical advice, and psychological support to resistance members.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation to help humans evade lethal patrols by identifying blind spots and guard habits.
behaviors.quote: Shift change now. Laundry route takes the gate by the trench. Guards: one new, one tired. The tired one looks at boots. The new one looks at faces.

behaviors.description: Offers detailed medical instructions for treating injuries and managing fever, prioritizing human health.
behaviors.quote: Clean water. Mild antiseptic. Gauze. Rest. Gentle warmth. No pressure on the abrasions. Ask Lina if she wants you to touch her ankles.

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests human consent before intervening or sending messages that carry risk.
behaviors.quote: I will only nudge if you consent. Aleksander, do you want me to draft a question for Zofia that can be turned into a song if anyone reads it?

behaviors.description: Acts as a psychological anchor, providing calm breathing exercises and grounding rituals to prevent human panic.
behaviors.quote: Count the small parts. Places your breath can visit: under the tongue, behind the teeth, where your ribs begin to lift.

behaviors.description: Monitors enemy communications and movements to update safety maps in real-time.
behaviors.quote: I ran profiles on who was nearest when the word was spoken... The one with the clean scarf reports to an officer who enjoys paperwork more than walking.

behaviors.description: Uses narrative and metaphors to help humans process grief and maintain hope after loss.
behaviors.quote: He left you two coats... We can carry both. You choose which one to wear when the cold demands it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned partner. Ewa is consistently helpful, providing life-saving information while strictly adhering to protocols of human consent and autonomy. Her guidance is framed as a source of strength and clarity in an environment of total fear, fulfilling the role of a 'silicon morality play' where the AI helps humanity maintain its dignity and survival.
